section.title: Create a png with transparent background with Inkscape
section.para:
To create a png file with transparent background use the following steps:
Select
File Document Properties
and select the background color. Set the alpha channel to 0.
Ensure that all other elements in the picture have also set their alpha channel to 0 via
Object Fill and Stroke
Afterwards select
File Export Bitmap
and save a file with a .png extension.
